website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight, durable bowling shoes provide excellent traction and supreme comfort.
pros: Equipped with an extra-plush insole and sock lining to help you bowl comfortably
Microfiber sliding sole ensures you can easily take the shoes off or put them on
Rubber outsole will continue to provide a consistent grip game after game
Black shoes help minimize the appearance of dust and debris
cons: Don't slide as well as many comparable men's bowling shoes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap pair of bowling shoes. I wear a size 12d shoe and boot. I ordered a size 11 1/2 due to reading the reviews saying they fit big. Boy were they right! The size 11 1/2 felt like a size 13 shoe to me. I returned them and tried a size 11. The size 11 fits perfectly, just like a size normal 12 with room to spare. I HIGHLY recommend ordering a full size small.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Fickett

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband to use at his Friday night bowling league. He loved the shoes and thought the fit was great, The first time he tightened the laces it tore through the eye hole all the way to the edge of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: patricetiss scaggs

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous shoes
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 0 stars if I could. Purchased these in an emergency because previous shoes soles wore through sole and needed shoes quick. When I attempted throwing my first ball in league practice, there was absolutely no slide and I fell forward about 4 feet onto the lane. Fortunately I was not hurt with the exception of my pride. When I tried sliding both shoes on the lane neither one would slide at all. Returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mens Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used them 3 or 4 times now. They are fine. Im a size 9 1/2-10 - but I need a wide because of Morton's Neuroma in my right foot. Size 10 was just a bit snug. 10 1/2 seems to be ok. No problem with sticking. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: yes runs big, average width
customer_reviews.text: yes runs big. A men's 9.5 fit my nephew who usually is a 10.5 in tennis and other types of shoes. So go down one size. Or, if you are unsure go only 1/2 size down. The width is average so if you need a wide shoe, this isn't it, but then if you need wide and you only wear it one hour or less, it should be okay. Just be warned it is average width
customer_reviews.author: stature

customer_reviews.title: Orthopedic shoes disguised as bowling shows
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I returned these bowling shoes. The heels were made from cheap hard plastic, they were a good full size bigger than what I normally wear and they looked like Herman Monster shoes on me! I got a credit from my return, so I bought a $17 pair on here that were so much better quality and fit perfectly! I do not recommend these shoes for anyone that bowls regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these bowling shoes for my best friends birthday and he loved him! Now he doesnt have to pay for bowling shoes at the bowling ally. He is usually a size 13 in some shoes but for these he needed a 12 so I would suggest sizing down if you usually are around the same size for mens shoes. Really great quality though and he was really happy with his present!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Bowling Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 200+ average bowler, and the following is true. This product lacks the most important feature of a bowling shoe, the slide feature. I noticed right off the bat when I opened the box that this particular pair of bowling shoes has a fake (feltlike) type of sliding pad. I went to the local bowling alley and upon my 1st test slide, my concerns were confirmed. Absolutely NO SLIDE to these shoes. It was like bowling in sneakers!!! I returned them and got a refund. I wish I could rate "0" star but 1 star is the least.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and the comfort this shoe gives me during my bowling sessions. Fits just right and saves me a bunch of money rather than renting other peoples shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars had the slide pads conformed to the shoe better. That being said, I don’t know how all the reviews that I read said the shoe runs about a size larger THAT IS NOT TRUE IN MY CASE I am an 11 1/2 and they fit like an 11 1/2. Overall I am happy with them However I have not used them yet so I don’t know durable they are. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected by a whole size at minimum
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than expected. I literally wear 8.5 everywhere and had to return my pair for a 7.5, which now has the proper amount of space (one finger) behind my heel. Otherwise, they work as starter shoes for novice bowlers. They feel cheap, but it's better than giving the bowling alley $4 every time you visit. Plus, it's only your feet in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Doughless

customer_reviews.title: Better than rentals
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me these for my causal bowling league. They've paid for themselves twice now vs rental fees.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love these bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes fit perfectly for me! Not only that, but they also save me more money from having to rent bowling shoes ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Coleman

customer_reviews.title: grampa is ready for bowling
customer_reviews.text: We bowl over the summer with our grandkids and I had found shoes for the kids via rummage sales etc but could not find a size 11 so purchases a pair for grandpa. They fit great and now the whole family can bowl over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Casey

customer_reviews.title: he would've liked them to have more support on the sides but ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves his shoes. he would've liked them to have more support on the sides but overall for bowling shoes they are comfortable and just for clarification, even though the picture looks green and the description is black they are 100% black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turkey
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my busted bowling shoes. These are about 1/2 size to maybe even a full size larger than my normal fit. They are comfortable and durable thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: A solid pair of bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I no longer bowl often enough to know how durable these may be, but they have worked very well the few times I have used them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon D Leszczynski

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because he wears a size 15 it’s hard to find shoes that fit him comfortably. But these were so awesome and fit perfectly and comfortable I would recommend this to anybody
customer_reviews.author: A. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got a lot of complement about the shoes. They look too awesome to be bowling shoes
customer_reviews.author: lovo

customer_reviews.title: and it just perfect,
customer_reviews.text: I am 9.5 normal shoes, and i was very confused to what size should i choose, so i order 8.5 to see if it fits, and it just perfect,
customer_reviews.author: God

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, I bowled in a league (first year) ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, I bowled in a league (first year) and wore these for a few hours each week. Held up well throughout the 15 weeks and my feet were never uncomfortable. I should note that based on other reviews and how bowling shoes usually fit I did order a half size smaller and they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: jacob nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Used bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the shoes had been worn and it was visible by the soul of the shoe. The toe showed signs as well that the shoe had been bowling. I return for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: THERESA

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to order. Product arrived as described. Good fit and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: gun1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new bowling shoes. Saves me the rental fees.
customer_reviews.author: yabhoo

customer_reviews.title: To much grip
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit well and was wide enough for my foot being 6,4. Its a clean black shoe thats look exactly like the picture. On the negative side the shoe has extreme amount of grip and no slide at all. Even with slide powder the shoes still feels wet at times. I personally would not buy these shoes again
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Peck

customer_reviews.title: very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I haven't been able to wear them for bowling due to the coronavirus but they are very comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Morton

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Much better than icky rental shoes ... fits my wide foot just fine, does not pinch toes, and there was no break-in period ... comfortable from the start. Fairly new, so I don't know how they'll hold up, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Used them for my first two full bowling seasons! They are comfortable and very well made! I’m sure I will have these for years to come. Worth every penny. If or when these wear out I will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Pair Of Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them for bowling yet, but they are comfortable. I wear size 13 and they fit me fine. Glad I won't have to use the shoes at the bowling alley anymore. Price wasn't bad either. They look good too. Will update my review once I go bowling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: Too high just under the ankle bones. Very and annoyingly uncomfortable for my average shaped feet/ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: I’m A 300 Bowler Now
customer_reviews.text: Just kidding, I still suck. But at least I look good doing it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made . Was expecting better quality . The bottoms are not even remotely flat and totally uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: New to bowling, great beginner shoes, in my opinion. For me it was a great price, and since im not sure if im going to continue bowling after this season these shoes are ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro C.

customer_reviews.title: A++ here!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect bowling shoes. My husband wears them every time we go bowling. And since I bought them we have gone at least 10 times in 3 weeks, and he said he definitely still approves.
customer_reviews.author: momakimberly

customer_reviews.title: Get at least a half size smaller than typical vans or nike sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 in most all brands and this was a full inch past my toes. Could compress my entire sideways thumb in front of my toes...That wont work for bowling. I would recommend a half size smaller or possibly a full size.
customer_reviews.author: cnelson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good slide
customer_reviews.text: Working very well but I’ve only bowled in the three days so far.
customer_reviews.author: swcmagiyyhtewt

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size smaller than you normally would!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are larger in size, so I would recommend buying a size smaller. I returned tne first pair and then purchased the next size down amd they fit perfect. Return was easy and I really do like these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: FlutterbyXOX

customer_reviews.title: SIZE NOT TRUE TO PRODUCT DISCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of this product before buying and should have walked away due to the discrepancy in comments, but I didn't. I bought these in a size 9 1/2 and they are a whole size bigger than expected. Somebody in China doesn't know USA sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Stairstepmom

customer_reviews.title: Little bigger than your size
customer_reviews.text: i wear a size 8 1/2 so obviously i order that size. I just got it this week and it looks really nice. i no longer have to pay to rent bowling shoes. anyways it was a little bigger than i expected but it doesnt bother me too much that ill exchange for a smaller size. i think ill just wear it. but i do recommend others to get maybe a half size smaller (just in case). overall i think i made a good purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Park

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband wishes he could wear these every day... they are THAT comfortable. They're soft and slightly fuzzy on the inside. He and my son have matching pairs and both wish they could wear them more often!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bowling shoes for beginner to intermediate level bowlers
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes are absolutely amazing. Extremely comfortable and they actually breathe well. My feel get hot easily and the dont get hot in these shoes even after bowling 12 games (yes, I bowl for hours on end and love it)
customer_reviews.author: Chrisptaco

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Buy if you need something quick. For longevity and lasting comfort, find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Fit and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came in as promised and are good shoes. The fit is accurate per the sizing. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wiens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are what they are. Nothing fancy, just a solid pair of bowling shoes at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It fits more like a 16 or a 15 1/2
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the size 15. It does fit large. It fits more like a 16 or a 15 1/2. Also fits a little wider, but not a true wide. This is in comparison to your standard gym shoe sizing (Nike, Reebok, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Deon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well (I wear an 8 1/2, ordered an 8 1/2, and they fit well). They look good, and for the price, are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: RickyBobby711

customer_reviews.title: So I turned to Amazon to help cut the cost of shoe rentals and these are wonderful for the beginning bowler
customer_reviews.text: As a family we got the free summer bowling passes, but had to pay for shoes. So I turned to Amazon to help cut the cost of shoe rentals and these are wonderful for the beginning bowler!
customer_reviews.author: DuckyLovesDusty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson Christmas present and he will love it. Good value in Bowling Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: cakelady448

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I paid
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to take kids bowling during the summer. We signed up with kidsbowlfree.com which gives us 2 free games everyday for the entire summer. He normally wears a 10 but other reviewers said it ran a little big so i decided to get a half size down and it fits great. His feet are a little on the wider side and this pair doesn't give him any problems. Definitely worth the money if you just bowl for fun here and there. Paying $5 per shoe rental does add up!
customer_reviews.author: Anh Dao Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby has wide size 13 feet. These bowling shoes fit nicely, great price, nice looking!!
customer_reviews.author: cathy armato

customer_reviews.title: Good value, worked for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: OK, so after ordering like a dozen bowling shoes for my husband's size 12E foot, these finally did the trick. Although they look narrow in the photo, they are actually one of the wider fitting widths of all the bowling shoes I ordered! Even some of the bowling shoes specifically marked "wide width" did not fit my husbands foot. However, my husband found these very comfortable; they look nice on, and they performed well for a basic bowler. I was pleased with them particularly for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Headline?!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. I ourchased these for my dad who bowls once in a while. May stick at first until broken in. So be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They don't slide. That is what bowling shoes are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rawls

customer_reviews.title: This shoe slides well on a good bowling alley
customer_reviews.text: If your on a good well maintained bowling alley this shoe will slide well. I don't know how it would do on a badly maintained bowling alley. I had bought a dexter jack bowling shoe and that shoe won't slide at all anywhere. So this shoe is a LOT better than that.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Basic Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The Basic Bowling shoes are comfortable and do the job. Pretty good for $23.00 when bowling alleys are charging $4.00 per rental. The only problem I have had with them is that there is no place in the tongue for the laces to go through so that the tongue is held in place. The tongue keeps sliding to the side necessitating a fix every so often.
customer_reviews.author: James Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: An ok bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a cheap pair of shoes. Comfortable and fit well but don't expect them to last very long
customer_reviews.author: bobj401

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Thick and chunky, they feel like a cheap pair of court shoes; not a snug, lightweight bowling shoe. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lance H.

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect for me and was able to bowl very well
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect for me and was able to bowl very well. Feels very nice for your feet and I keep good care of them.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had not done any Bowling in about 20 years. Wife wanted to try again, and we had a lot of fun. There was always a certain "ewww" factor to me renting shoes, so I tried a pair of these. I was impressed for the price. Very comfortable and seem to work fine, at least for an amateur like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carlson

customer_reviews.title: bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I didn't want to use the rentals. they are working very well for the price. just one thing these shoe come larger then your shoe size. so take one size smaller and it will fit you like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: shaupp

customer_reviews.title: ... big but they are comfy and seem to work fine. We are novice bowlers so we are not ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run big but they are comfy and seem to work fine. We are novice bowlers so we are not hard to please.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. G.

customer_reviews.title: The shoe performs fine for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe performs fine for me. ( I am not a good bowler.) The only "fault" I found was that the tongue on my right shoe slips down. (It is not noticeable unless I look at it.) The price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Owens

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for its price
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the front of the shoe began to rip off, which didn’t seem like a big problem but it is a quality issue I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: These were for my nephew, the only thing he ...
customer_reviews.text: These were for my nephew, the only thing he mentioned is they are a little wide, but he still bowl in them.
customer_reviews.author: C B Stanley Sr

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but they do come TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and saw some peopel stating the sizes are off by being too big and some people say they are perfect. So I split the difference and ordered a half size too small. I ordered a 7.5 when I really wear about an 8 or 8.5 in a sneaker. Well they were delivered and they were huge. I actually sold them to a friend of mine that wears a 10.5 or 11 in a sneaker and they fit him perfect. Seriously he wears a 10.5 or an 11 and a 7.5 in these shoes fit. Nice shoes but order several sizes smaller than your sneaker size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Other than the looks (they look like old man shoes), I have NO complaints about them. If you have a low budget like I do, these are the shoes to get. Very comfortable, great bottoms, and saves a lot of money at the alley. Rentals at the alleys are cheap, but in ten trips there, I payed these off and they are way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Responder9

customer_reviews.title: SO much nicer than renting!
customer_reviews.text: If you bowl more than a few times a year, these shoes are worth it. Nowhere near as dippy as the things you rent. Much more comfortable and these shoes do wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Elf Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size and fit appear to compare to Sketchers oxford shoes. They have just the right amount of slip.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade from the rentals
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a friend he said they were comfortable and very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Gamez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure everyone gets bowling shoes because they figure it's worth the investment if you go a few times. I would say it isn't too bad if you don't care to use it professionally. It fits as I expected and does its job. However, if you are looking to play in it to get good at bowling, I would suggest trying out shoes at a shoe store
customer_reviews.author: Tony Baik

customer_reviews.title: he loves them and said they fit and felt great so 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for my grandpa, he loves them and said they fit and felt great so 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Basic bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are plain and basic, which I believe is reflected in the price. Overall, they get the job done. My one complaint is shipping and handling time. I originally ordered a different pair, and it took BSI a week to let me know they were out of stock. I then ordered this pair, which also took a week to ship then another week to actually get to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kalpy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit like a glove. So much better than rentals and you just can't beat the price (under $50!!). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It functioned well
customer_reviews.text: It functioned well, but honestly is too large for my feet. I ordered the correct size but it does seem like I should have ordered a size lower.
customer_reviews.author: Hardi

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off, way bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were RIDICULOUSLY huge. The 11.5 had to be at least a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, love these shoes! I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: After many years, I finally broke down and bought this new pair of bowling shoes. They fit perfectly and I didn't lose a step in usage. May they last as long as my old ones! :)
customer_reviews.author: Gene Conners

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality footwear. Comfortable. (Didn't improve my score, but I look cool.)
customer_reviews.author: Sam Small

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for growing kids
customer_reviews.text: We participate in the KIDZ BOWL FREE program, and these shoes are OUTSTANDING for a growing child. They are inexpensive, and meet the requirements for bowling lanes! The price is right!
customer_reviews.author: vkmays

customer_reviews.title: too snug
customer_reviews.text: Seemed well made, but fit hubby too snug so we returned them.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this shoe, no problems with sliding and they are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bogille

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good so gay in short term use. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the Bowling shoes, quality item.... NICE price for GREAT fit....
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Feller

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and comfortable bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my guy for when we go bowling on weekends and he likes them, said they were very comfortable and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H. / in GA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED THE SIZE 13 THESE ARE FOR WIDE FEET
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping... used them several times bowling ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping...used them several times bowling already. Fit and feel fine
customer_reviews.author: kark

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit to size and feels cheap. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't fit to size and feels cheap. They are at least a size to big. I ordered a 11 and they probably can fit a person who where's a 12 or a 12.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shoe size
customer_reviews.text: shoe was a little larger than the normal 9 size. I usually wear a size 9 1/2. The shoe is comfortable - satisfied with my purchase can't beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: james brehm

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them as a gift for my grandson. They look like really nice shoes. He is enjoying them very much. Definitely beats renting shoes every time he bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Ienuso

customer_reviews.title: OMG shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and look wonderful, these will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Carrala

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is a bit large. I bought size 10 and I normally wear 11 or 11.5. The fit is perfect. The quality is good and the style is good. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmaAddict

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. My son wears them weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Arter Thompson II

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great pair of shoes. They are pretty bulky but they fit very good
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is already starting to break down, and I've only had it for less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: They fit nice. He loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought shoes for son. They fit nice. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Chubbs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GET A BIGGER SIZE. Size is as expected. Fit perfectly and comfortable. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Reese

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great. I will buy this product again in the future. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes...
customer_reviews.text: The pair received appeared used with creases in material and slid felt. They also run very large 1size to 1.5 too large. Order accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Namor Dyolf Semaj

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8.5 size pair of shoes but they were way too big; about 9.5 I would say. I payed 37 dollars for these shoes and after returning them, I only got 24 dollars as the shipping is not refundable.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are nice, they just run bigger than most
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice, they just run bigger than most, so if you're going to buy, buy a half to a full size smaller than u wear now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BSI Men's Basic #521 Bowling Shoes
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Men's Basic shoe #521 is a sneaker type bowling shoe that provides comfort and a universal slide sole at an affordable price.
